I agree all stores should be closed on thanksgiving. I remember growing up the only think open was 7-11 and the two gas stations right off the interstate. That meant if you forgot anything for your thanksgiving dinner you better be able to get it at one of those locations or you went with out and there was NO SHOPPING until 7AM the next day.
